title: Is a long life everything? - Quora

response.answer_text: Long life, as it is, is not everything. It should be “a long and healthy life.” If you want to live a long life, might as well do everything that would promote healthy aging. Did you know that meditation is actually linked to longevity? Read more about it here.
What are you looking for in this answer. I fear answering will provide you nothing because there is no right or wrong way to answer this. It depends on the persons morales.
